listitem.para: whether and how setup should adjust the reverse path filtering mechanism for the physical devices to be used. Values are %unchanged (to leave it alone) or 0, 1, 2 (values to set it to). /proc/sys/net/ipv4/conf/PHYS/rp_filter is badly documented; it must be 0 in many cases for ipsec to function. The default value for the parameter is 0, that is, to disablerp_filter for all interfaces used.
